content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

The shortest path from node 5 to node 8 is:

15->16->8

Note: This path includes the intermediate nodes 15, 16, and 8. If you wish to avoid any intermediate nodes, please let me know and I will provide the shortest path accordingly.

The shortest path from node 8 to node 5 is:

8->16->5

Note: This path includes the intermediate nodes 8, 16, and 5. If you wish to avoid any intermediate nodes, please let me know and I will provide the shortest path accordingly.
